price: I on izvrši smotru ptica, pa reče: “Zašto ne vidim pupavca, da nije odsutan?
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
